infos.value: We're still a ways from the border with Fennes, huh?
...Hey. Maybe, perhaps...
Yeah, I was thinking the same thing.
...What, what?
The people that we've been fighting and defeating up until now...
Fennes soldiers...right?
Ahh. Now that you mention it, maybe so.
Meaning...
The border with Fennes might be around here.
...If so, then we're about to meet with the chief of Fennes!?
...Who are you?
*Sniff sniff* ...
Ahh... Some kind of noble smell...
This person... Could it be the chief of Fennes!?
H-hey...Nasha!?
Those two are enemies of Fennes...
So, how about you fight them with me...?
...Are you double-crossing us!?
Please wait a moment.
I'm Mont, the crown prince of Leonis.
Whaaat!?
The crown prince...? Then who is Lord Sterne...?
We're twin brothers.
Oh, is that so!?
What kind of place is this Leonis? There's an abundance of handsome men!
But why are you out here in such a remote area, Lord Mont?
I'm here to drive back the Fennes soldiers on our borders.
Well, then. This really is the border with Fennes.
Quite a lot of Fennes soldiers have already fallen.
Did you three deal with all of them?
Yes, that's right.
But, why would you—?
Actually...
...I see. It must have been an order from Lilyth.
We'll do whatever it takes to join the ranks of «Fortem»!
So if we get credit for our good deeds here, maybe our dream will come true...
So that's what you were doing out here?
I see. I'll try talking with Sterne and see what I can do.
Y-you would really do that!?
Yes.
If you three are this capable, it would surely be for Leonis's benefit.
Yay!
Well, then. Shall we return to Leonis Castle together?
Okay!
